DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore whether adherence upper extremity home program change person post stroke practice prefer music .
DOC.brief_title: Music Adherence Home Programs Post Stroke
DOC.criteria: Ages 4085 Mild Moderate hemiparesis determine score 21 50 FM UE At least 6 month post stroke American English primary language Significant visual impairment determine `` aphasiafriendly '' age appropriate screening Significant hearing impairment determine selfreport Actively receive occupational physical therapy service upper extremity motor recovery Severe auditory comprehension impairment understand onestep direction indicate WABR score 8/10 Sequential Commands Subtest Sitting stand blood pressure 180/110 HE > 100 bpm
